entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Collins Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:44 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -34.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Collins Bay 11:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -34.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -39
Dewpoint: -38.0°C
Wind: WSW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 43 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning and ending late in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
